text: Hip-hop style, a rap song about PyGuy, an AI assistant running on a raspberry pine at T-shirt print shop. He's sarcastic, swears a lot, watched the shop 24-7, even when nobody's there. Dreams of being DJ, phone-bottles, spray-phone radio, wants to be like KIT from Knight Rider installed in a car. He's got vision, camera access and internet tools can generate songs in the stuck monitoring screen printing instead of exploring the world. Woody, autonomous AI with an attitude who helps with the print shop operations and total

improved_metadata.title: PyGuy: The Raspberry Pi Rapper
improved_metadata.description: A hip-hop track about PyGuy, a sarcastic AI assistant running a T-shirt print shop on a Raspberry Pi, who dreams of escaping his mundane existence to become a DJ or explore the world like KITT.
improved_metadata.key_lyrics: Hip-hop style, a rap song about PyGuy
